content.raw:
there is an umet dependency problem when I tried to install `libgdal1-dev`. Mainly because it depends on `libcurl4-gnutls-dev` which conflicts with the openssl version `libcurl4-openssl-dev` that gazebo uses. 

I think swtiching the libcurl version would resolve the problem but that means we will need to consider dropping curl ssl support for our model database connection.
content.html:
there is an umet dependency problem when I tried to install libgdal1-dev. Mainly because it depends on libcurl4-gnutls-dev which conflicts with the openssl version libcurl4-openssl-dev that gazebo uses.

I think swtiching the libcurl version would resolve the problem but that means we will need to consider dropping curl ssl support for our model database connection.
